person.persName: John T. Wise (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, physician. )

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, physician. Virginia native. Son of Jane C. Wise. Married to Mary Wise. Father of Kate Wise and Charles L. Wise. Physician in Covington, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Covington in 1860. Employed Susan Dagwall as a servant in Covington in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860. Physician in Kenton County in 1863.
